widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 0), size = (760, 40), font=0, text=0, color = 0x00ffffff, color_sel = 0x00ffffff), # text 1 is the menu_entry, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 36), size = (760, 35), font=1, text=2, color = 0x008A8787, color_sel = 0x00ffffff),# text 2 is the menu_enty_description ], "fonts": [gFont("FHD", 26), gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 70 }

screen.name: doFlashImage
screen.title: Flash On the fly (select a image)

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 1), size = (860, 35), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 32), size = (860, 32), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (5, 4), size = (44, 44), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 58), size = (860, 2), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("FHD", 23),gFont("Regular", 19)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 0), size = (600, 40), color = 0x0058bcff, color_sel = 0x00ffffff, font=0, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (110, 35), size = (800, 60), font=1, flags = RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (700, 0), size = (200, 50), font=2,color = 0x00999999, color_sel = 0x00999999, flags = RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (10, 10), size = (80, 80), png = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("FHD", 24),gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 100 }
